p: To quantify the effect of climate change on groundwater nitrate content, an original mass balance approach, based on a lumped-parameter model, provides an evaluation of the impact of changing hydrological conditions on the selected aquifers. The approach presented by Thomann and Mueller ( 1987; Appendix 1) considers an aquifer with a constant water storage ( dV/ dt = 0), under a constant flow, Q, and a variable nitrate mass input, W( t).
